alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:59AM CDT until June 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD...SEBASTIAN...SOUTHEASTERN SEQUOYAH AND NORTHEASTERN LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 1159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barling, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Lavaca... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Dyer... Hackett... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Cameron... Moffett... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 15. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 315 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
